function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Iterative solving of equations can lead to algorithmic errors and incorrect solutions.","Impact":"Incorrect solutions could lead to incorrect predictions or decisions in disease modeling or containment strategies.","Mitigation":"Careful validation of algorithm output and use of multiple computational methods for verification.","Technologies":"Validation frameworks, multiple algorithmic approaches, and peer review of results.","People":"Mathematicians, data scientists, and epidemiologists using iterative solving for disease modeling.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and academic journals."},{"Description":"Trust region approximation may introduce inaccuracies in function behavior estimation.","Impact":"Inaccurate estimation could lead to misjudgment of disease propagation and effectiveness of containment strategies.","Mitigation":"Sensitivity analysis of trust region parameters, validation against known test cases, and statistical validation of function behavior.","Technologies":"Sensitivity analysis tools, validation frameworks, and statistical analysis software.","People":"Mathematicians, data scientists, and epidemiologists using trust region approximation for disease modeling.","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations, and academic journals."}]}
